櫓: (ろ) - Remo, torre, torre de vigia; palco alto de madeira, andaime; estrutura de madeira (de um kotatsu)
櫓太鼓: (やぐらだいこ) - {sumo} drums which announce the opening of a stage performance or commencement of bouts; the sound produced by such drums
櫓杭: (ろぐい) - fulcrum peg (fitted into the cavity in an oar as part of a traditional oarlock)
櫓臍: (ろべそ) - fulcrum peg (fitted into the cavity in an oar as part of a traditional oarlock)
櫛の歯が抜けたよう: (くしのはがぬけたよう) - (unorthodox version of 櫛の歯が欠けたよう)  missing important things here and there; full of gaps
櫛の歯が欠けたよう: (くしのはがかけたよう) - missing important things here and there; full of gaps; as if the teeth of a comb were missing
櫛匣: (くしばこ) - comb box; toiletries case
櫛水母: (クシクラゲ) - comb jelly (any jellyfish-like animal of the phylum Ctenophora)
櫛水母類: (くしくらげるい) - comb jellies (jellyfish-like animals of the phylum Ctenophora)
櫛目: (くしめ) - (sign of) combing; comb pattern (esp. pottery)
櫛箱: (くしばこ) - comb box; toiletries case
櫛風沐雨: (しっぷうもくう) - (yoji) struggling through wind and rain; undergoing hardships
櫛風浴雨: (しっぷうよくう) - (yoji) struggling through wind and rain; undergoing hardships
櫟: (れき) - Oak For Charcoal , sawtooth oak (Carvalho-da-semente-aguda)
櫨の木: (ハゼ) - wax tree (species of sumac, Rhus succedanea)
欄: (ran) - column , section (por exemplo, em um jornal), column, page; field (in a form, web page, etc.), blank
欄参照: (らんさんしょう) - column reference; see column below
欄杆: (らんかん) - guardrail/handrail/bannister/balustrade/parapet; (欄干, 闌干 only)  (a person) shining like the stars or moon/(a person) crying endlessly
欅: (きょ) - Keyaki , Japanese zelkova (espécie de árvore semelhante ao olmo, Zelkowa serrata)
欝状態: (うつじょうたい) - depressive state (e.g. of manic depression); depressive condition
欝積: (うっせき) - accumulation (e.g. of emotions, grievances, etc.); buildup; suppression (e.g. of anger)
欠かす: (かかす) - to miss (doing); to fail (to do)
欠かせない: (かかせない) - indispensable; vital; fundamental; imperative; crucial; critical
欠き餅: (かきもち) - mochi cut thin, dried, and baked or fried
欠く: (かく) - to chip/to nick/to break/to crack; to lack
欠くことができない: (かくことができない) - indispensable; essential; necessary
欠くことのできない: (かくことのできない) - indispensable; essential; necessary
欠くべからざる: (かくべからざる) - indispensable; essential; necessary
欠ける: (かける) - to be chipped/to be damaged/to be broken; to be lacking/to be missing; to be insufficient/to be short/to be deficient/to be negligent toward; (also 虧ける) (of the moon) to wane/to go into eclipse
欠け目: (かけめ) - chip (in a cup); shortage of weight
欠を補う: (けつをおぎなう) - to bridge a gap; to supply a lack
欠乏症: (けつぼうしょう) - deficiency disease (e.g. protein, vitamin, etc.)
欠伸: (けんしん) - yawn/yawning (and stretching); (欠 only) kanji "yawning" radical (radical 76)
欠勤届: (けっきんとどけ) - report of an absence (at work)
欠勤届け: (けっきんとどけ) - report of an absence (at work)
欠品: (けっぴん) - stockout; out of stock
欠場: (けつじょう) - absence; not taking part
欠字: (けつじ) - omitted word; blank type; missing letter
欠巻: (けっかん) - missing volume (e.g. of a set of books)
欠席届: (けっせきとどけ) - report of a school absence
欠席届け: (けっせきとどけ) - report of a school absence
欠席裁判: (けっせきさいばん) - trial in absentia; judgment by default (judgement)
欠所: (けっしょ) - confiscation of property (Edo period)
欠掖: (けってき) - unstitched, open side of some traditional Japanese clothing/clothing with such an open side; robe worn by military officials with a round collar, unstitched open sides and no ran
欠損: (けっそん) - deficit; shortage; loss; damage
欠点: (ketten) - falha, defeito, imperfeição, ponto fraco, fraqueza, deficiência, desvantagem; reprovação (em um exame), nota insuficiente
欠礼: (けつれい) - failure to pay one's compliments; omission of courtesy
欠缺: (けんけつ) - lacuna; gap where something is lacked
欠課: (けっか) - cutting class; absence from school
